addr: 45 Prescot Street,  London, England E1 8GP GB
title: The United Kurls Collective Presents: Lounge & Learn 'The Christmas Edition'
desc: The talented Sister E from The Calabash Hub will be delivering an interactive and practical session on the heart of head wrapping. Attendees can learn basic techniques to create simple and elegant styles that will allow them to protect their tresses from the elements this winter. ? With the weather starting to get colder, it?s time to start protecting those precious strands. YouTube vlogger, Fusion Of Cultures, will share her tips on how to care for natural hair during the cold winter months.
